description: M.H. Gamini Chandrasiri Vs. Hon. Attorney General - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J before  The manner in which the precautions that are to be taken by the owner of a vehicle in order to prevent an offence being committed using his vehicle.
parties: M.H. Gamini Chandrasiri Vs. Hon. Attorney General - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J
judgement_by: The manner in which the precautions that are to be taken by the owner of a vehicle in order to prevent an offence being committed using his vehicle.
